Title: Scarecrowman
Description: ['A regular old scarecrow has stood in a field for twenty years when one day, after a lightning storm, he comes to life. He becomes friends with the daughter of a scarecrow shop owner.']
Related: ['Prequel: Sentai Hero Sukiyaki Force: Gunma no Heiwa wo Negau Season']
Staff: [['Takeuchi, Yoshio', 'Director'], ['Kameyama, Koichiro', 'Music'], ['Miyano, Takashi', 'Art Director'], ['Hiyoshi, Kei', 'Series Composition']]
